author: peter.davies
content: Turns out that the whole "Payment of zero transaction fees clears an empty account thing is actually tested". https://github.com/ethereum/tests/blob/develop/src/GeneralStateTestsFiller/stZeroKnowledge2/ecadd_0-0_0-0_21000_80Filler.json and some related tests have an empty account as coinbase. I don't know if any intentional tests have been written, though.

author: m0_ox
content: yep, these were the tests that failed in `py-evm`

author: m0_ox
content: There's about 15 of them, all ECADD or ECMUL tests
